Title: The basement of the house
Text: I just go to the end of the stairs. No fucking light. What is this smell?
I could not find the switches to turn the lights on. After I felt the wall, I found them and I could now turn on the lights!.
No lights were turn on in the stairs but the basement light was turned on. As i look around i found some fucking nasty shit.
Some baby diapers were just laying around on the floor. Jesus, incredible that the smell didn't go to upstairs.
Lets just get the fuck out of here before i pass out from this smell.
